channel.title: Openvpn Riseup!
channel.description:
Hey,my old account bmtkn was lost,this new one. As topic said i managed to connect to Riseup vpn with network manager and kde plasma widget with this instructions https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Tunnels/Connecting_to_Tor_before_a_VPN
"Inside Whonix-Workstation nano /etc/whonix_firewall.d/30_default.conf WORKSTATION_FIREWALL=1 TUNNEL_FIREWALL_ENABLE=true Reload Firewall"
Does not work with me,have missed something? )))

item.title: Openvpn Riseup!
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Follow the instructions from the beginning to the end. GUI methods (network manager / kde plasma widget) are unsupported.

Read full topic

item.title: Openvpn Riseup!
item.dc:creator: bmtkn1
item.description:
Hey,my old account bmtkn was lost,this new one.
As topic said i managed to connect to Riseup vpn with network manager and kde plasma widget with this instructions

Whonix

Tunnels/Connecting to Tor before a VPN

Instructions on how to connect to Tor before a VPN (User -> Tor -> VPN -> Internet)

“Inside Whonix-Workstation
nano /etc/whonix_firewall.d/30_default.conf
WORKSTATION_FIREWALL=1
TUNNEL_FIREWALL_ENABLE=true
Reload Firewall”

Does not work with me,have missed something? )))

Read full topic
